puavo.admin.cleanup.homedirs.ensure_free.description: If true, remove most unused home directories when disk space is low

puavo.admin.cleanup.homedirs.freespace_m.description: Ensure this many bytes of disk space for home directories when .ensure_free_space is true

puavo.admin.cleanup.old_user_homedir_day.description: Number of days a home directory must be unused before it is removed, when .remove_old_users is true and user account has already been removed

puavo.admin.cleanup.remove_old_users.description: If true, users deleted from Puavo are also deleted from devices (but see also .old_user_homedir_daylimit)
